about_the_game:
Reveal the memories through "Spot the Difference."
Escape from the endless loop in a single-path maze.

This is a single-player adventure game drawn with flickering lights and pixel art.

Game Description

This game is a side-scrolling adventure game.
You can move right or left, but you will always end up returning to the same place.

There is only one way to move forward. Carefully observe the paintings.
You will notice there’s a painting that differs slightly from the one you saw before.

If you feel something is off, take a stop and look at the painting.
If it has changed, congratulations! You have taken a step forward, and now you are ready to look for the next change.

As you discover changes one by one, the path forward will open up.
Now, you are ready for your journey in the looping art museum.

Controls

The game is controlled using only the keyboard.

The Character can only move to the left or right.
A key or Left Arrow key: Move left
D key or Right Arrow key: Move right

There are also parts where you will be required to enter text.
Please use the keyboard to input the word.

Story

On a cold day, the protagonist visits the art gallery for the first time in a while.
She got attracted to one specific painting.
As time passes while they are fascinated, people around her disappear.
But when trying to leave, she noticed something strange.
Whether she goes back or forth, the same painting appears in front of her again and again and again...

This is a looping art museum.

Clever "Mr.Cat" talks to you and tells you to play "Spot the Difference" in the museum.
You have to observe the paintings closely and start naming them.
Find the paintings which are changing stealthily.
Can you escape from the loop by repeating "Spot the Difference"?
And what secrets lie hidden in the looping art museum?

Developer Profile

Name: Nekko
A mechanical engineer turned indie game developer.
For some reason, I am burning through my savings day and night, devoting myself to game development.
Obsessed with the charm of pixel art, they endlessly tweak the positions of pixels if left alone.

short_description: "Looping Art Museum" is a single-player adventure game where you wander through an infinitely-looping art museum, finding changes in the paintings to progress. Interact with a talking "Mr.Cat" and uncover the mysteries of the strange art museum.
